I stand firmly in saying full, regular travel needs to resume on the bridge. https://t.co/ppQOOWupzb

Nixon. Ford. Reagan. George H. W. and George W. Bush. 

The VRA was reauthorized & amended 5 times under these Republican Presidents and with overwhelming bipartisan support. Yet, Republicans are choosing the Big Lie over our democracy & making voting rights a partisan issue.

This is disappointing, but we can't give up. It‚Äôs personal for me. Black women's fight for the right to vote didn't end in 1920 w/the 19th Amendment‚Äîthey kept going for 45 yrs more.
